description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.1M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with UNIVERSITY OF ALBERTA. The average
  contract duration was 0.82 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $70.1K.
  The longest contract was 4.65 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $2.0M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '2.1M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '176'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '25'
